words.source: Wayyiqtol (vav-consecutive imperfect); root BRK (barak); KJV, ESV, NASB all render 'blessed'
Proper noun; subject of the verb; all translations agree
Accusative particle (et); marks the direct object Pharaoh; untranslated in English
Proper noun; direct object of 'blessed'; all translations agree
Wayyiqtol (vav-consecutive imperfect); root YTZ (yatsa); KJV, ESV, NASB all render 'went out'
Preposition min (from) + preposition le (to) + construct noun panim (face); idiomatically 'from before' or 'from the presence of'; KJV 'from before', ESV/NASB 'from his presence'
Proper noun; object of the preposition phrase; all translations agree
